definition: unprocessed sun-dried tea leaves used to make black or green tea

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: The raw material adopts fresh and sun-greened big leaf species tea of Yunnan.
sentences.chinese: 云南大叶种鲜叶制成的晒青毛茶。

definition: tea leaves gathered at springtime or the tea made from these leaves
Pu'er tea from the Pu'er region of Yunnan
a cake of tea, commonly Pu'er tea 普洱茶[Pu3 er3 cha2], compacted into a bowl or nest shape/dome shaped tea-brick/caked tea
dark tea, a variety of fermented tea (e.g. Pu'er tea 普洱茶[Pu3 er3 cha2])
Tieguanyin tea (a variety of oolong tea)
variant of 單叢|单丛[Dan1 cong1]
gunpowder tea, Chinese green tea whose leaves are each formed into a small pellet
